TriggerOraclev10g.name: UNIQUE_USERNAME_DBUSER
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
DECLARE
CURSOR LIST IS SELECT USERNAME FROM USERNAMES_TEMP;
BEGIN
FOR US IN LIST LOOP
IF UPPER(TRIGGER_MT.TEMP_USER.USERNAME) = UPPER(US.USERNAME) THEN
RAISE_APPLICATION_ERROR(-20003, 'El nombre de usuario ya est√° utilizado.');
END IF;
END LOOP;
DELETE FROM USERNAMES_TEMP;
END;
